original_title: Archbishop of Colombo Cardinal Malclom Ranjith conducts the Christmas service at Our Lady of Sorrows Church in Ja-Ela.
original_body_lines: Archbishop of Colombo Cardinal Malclom Ranjith conducts the Christmas service at Our Lady of Sorrows Church in Ja-Ela. A large crowd was present for the mid night service - Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
